name: Gérard Buttman in "Oh Mummy"
description:
A game by Johanne POTH, Benjamin DELMAL, Maxime BECO, Gilles GODARD & Jonathan ETIENNE.

Gerard is hungry for treasures. Help him steal all the mummy's treasures.

Score as high as possible and share it with us !

Fell free to download the game to have an optimized experience.
